fields.label: First Name
fields.help_text: Enter your legal first name as it appears on official documents

fields.label: Middle Name
fields.help_text: Enter your middle name exactly as it appears on your government-issued identification. Leave blank if you don't have a middle name.

fields.label: Last Name
fields.help_text: Provide your legal last name exactly as it appears on your government-issued identification

fields.label: Suffix
fields.help_text: Optional name suffix (Jr., Sr., II, III, etc.)

fields.label: Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter your 9-digit Social Security Number. Required for primary applicant identification.

fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.help_text: Enter your date of birth exactly as it appears on your government-issued identification

fields.label: Email Address
fields.help_text: Enter your email address for application correspondence and notifications

fields.label: Primary Phone
fields.help_text: Enter your primary contact phone number

fields.label: Alternate Phone Number
fields.help_text: Provide an alternate phone number where you can be reached if needed

fields.label: Government ID Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of government-issued identification you will provide

fields.label: ID Number
fields.help_text: Enter the identification number from the government-issued ID you selected above

fields.label: Issuing State
fields.help_text: Select the state that issued your identification document

fields.label: Expiration Date
fields.help_text: Enter the expiration date from your identification document

fields.label: Street Address
fields.help_text: Enter the first line of your street address

fields.label: Address Line 2
fields.placeholder: Apt, Suite, Unit, Building, Floor, etc. (optional)
fields.help_text: Enter apartment number, suite, unit, or other secondary address information if applicable

fields.label: City
fields.help_text: Enter the city of your current residential address

fields.label: State
fields.help_text: Enter the two-letter state abbreviation for your address

fields.label: ZIP Code
fields.help_text: Enter your 5-digit ZIP code or ZIP+4 format

fields.label: Residence Type
fields.help_text: Select whether you own your home, rent, live with family, or have another living arrangement.

fields.label: Years at Current Address
fields.help_text: Enter the number of years you have lived at your current address. You may use decimals for partial years (e.g., 1.5 for one and a half years).

fields.label: Monthly Rent/Mortgage Payment
fields.help_text: Enter your monthly rent or mortgage payment amount in dollars

fields.label: Co-Applicant
fields.help_text: Check this box if there is a co-applicant for this loan. You will need to provide the co-applicant's information including name, SSN, and email address.

fields.label: Co-Applicant First Name
fields.help_text: First name of the co-applicant (only required if there is a co-applicant for this loan)

fields.label: Co-Applicant Middle Name
fields.help_text: Middle name of the co-applicant (spouse, business partner, or guarantor). Leave blank if not applicable.

fields.label: Co-Applicant Last Name
fields.help_text: Provide the last name of the co-applicant (spouse, business partner, or guarantor) if applicable.

fields.label: Co-Applicant Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter the Social Security Number for the co-applicant. This field is only required if you are applying with a co-applicant.

fields.label: Co-Applicant Date of Birth
fields.help_text: Enter the co-applicant's date of birth. This information is used for identity verification and credit history evaluation.

fields.label: Co-Applicant Phone Number
fields.help_text: Enter the co-applicant's primary contact phone number

fields.label: Co-Applicant Email Address
fields.help_text: Enter the co-applicant's email address for correspondence regarding this loan application

fields.label: Relationship to Primary Applicant
fields.help_text: Select how the co-applicant is related to the primary applicant on this application

fields.label: Current Employer
fields.help_text: Enter your current employer's name. If self-employed, enter your business name. If retired, enter 'Retired' and provide pension or retirement income details in the financial section.

fields.label: Job Title
fields.help_text: Enter your current job title or position at your employer

fields.label: Years Employed
fields.help_text: Enter the number of years you have been employed at your current position. Use the months field for partial years.

fields.label: Months
fields.help_text: Enter the number of months (0-11) you have been employed at your current position. Use this field together with 'Years Employed' to specify your total employment duration.

fields.label: Current Employer Address
fields.help_text: Enter the full address of your current employer. If retired, state 'Retired' and provide pension or retirement income details in the financial section.

fields.label: Employer Phone Number
fields.help_text: Enter the main phone number of your current employer

fields.label: Annual Salary/Income
fields.help_text: Enter your current annual salary or income in dollars. Do not include commas or dollar signs.

fields.label: Employment Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of employment for your previous employer. Required if you have been at your current job for less than 2 years.

fields.label: Previous Employer Name
fields.help_text: Required only if you have been at your current employer for less than 2 years

fields.label: Previous Job Title
fields.help_text: Enter your job title at your previous employer (only required if you've been at your current job for less than 2 years)

fields.label: Years at Previous Employment
fields.help_text: Enter the number of years you worked at your previous employer

fields.label: Legal Business Name
fields.placeholder: Enter the legal name of your business
fields.help_text: Provide the official legal name of your business as registered with the state. This should match your incorporation or registration documents.

fields.label: DBA / Trade Name
fields.help_text: Enter the "Doing Business As" name or trade name if your business operates under a name different from its legal registered name.

fields.label: Federal EIN (Tax ID)
fields.help_text: Enter your 9-digit Federal Employer Identification Number (EIN) assigned by the IRS. Format: XX-XXXXXXX

fields.label: Business Entity Type
fields.help_text: Select the legal structure of your business. This determines how your business is taxed and your liability exposure.

fields.label: Industry / NAICS Code
fields.help_text: Select the primary industry that best describes your business operations. This corresponds to the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS).

fields.label: Date Established
fields.help_text: Enter the date when your business was officially established or registered

fields.label: State of Incorporation
fields.help_text: Enter the two-letter state abbreviation where your business is incorporated or organized

fields.label: Number of Employees
fields.help_text: Enter the total number of employees in your business

fields.label: Business Address - Street
fields.help_text: Enter the street address of your business location

fields.label: City
fields.help_text: Enter the city where your business is located

fields.label: State
fields.help_text: Enter the two-letter state abbreviation for the business address

fields.label: ZIP Code
fields.help_text: Enter the ZIP code for the business address

fields.label: Business Phone
fields.help_text: Enter the primary phone number for your business

fields.label: Business Fax Number
fields.help_text: Enter the fax number for your business (optional)

fields.label: Business Website
fields.help_text: Enter the website URL for the business (optional)

fields.label: Owner 1 Name
fields.help_text: Enter the full legal name of the first business owner as it appears on official documents.

fields.label: Owner 1 Title
fields.help_text: Enter the title or role of the first owner with 20% or more ownership in the business

fields.label: Owner 1 Percentage Owned
fields.help_text: Enter the percentage of ownership for Owner 1. Use whole numbers or decimals (e.g., 50 or 33.33).

fields.label: Owner 1 Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter the Social Security Number for the first owner. Format: XXX-XX-XXXX

fields.label: Owner 2 Name
fields.help_text: Enter the full legal name of the second business owner. If there is only one owner, leave this field blank.

fields.label: Title (Owner 2)
fields.help_text: Enter the title or role of the second owner with 20% or more ownership in the business.

fields.label: Owner 2 Percentage Owned
fields.help_text: Enter the percentage of ownership for the second owner. Must be a number between 0 and 100.

fields.label: Owner 2 Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter the Social Security Number for the second owner. Required if there is a second owner listed.

fields.label: Owner 3 Name
fields.help_text: Provide the full legal name of the third business owner. Only required if there are three or more owners.

fields.label: Owner 3 Title
fields.help_text: Enter the title or position of the third owner with 20% or more ownership in the business.

fields.label: Owner 3 Percentage Owned
fields.help_text: Enter the percentage of ownership for the third owner. Use decimals if needed (e.g., 33.33 for one-third ownership).

fields.label: Owner 3 Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter the Social Security Number for the third owner. Required if there is a third owner with ownership percentage.

fields.label: Loan Amount Requested
fields.help_text: Specify the total dollar amount you are requesting for this loan. Interest rates: variable at +1.5% or fixed at 7.25% (subject to change).

fields.label: Purpose of Loan
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for which you are requesting this loan. You may select multiple options if applicable.

fields.label: Purpose of Loan
fields.help_text: Select the primary reason you are applying for this business loan. You may select multiple options if applicable.

fields.label: Purpose of Loan
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for which you are requesting this loan. Multiple selections may be allowed depending on your specific needs.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for your loan request. Choose the option that best describes how you intend to use the funds.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for which you will use the loan funds. Choose 'Other' if your purpose is not listed and provide details.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary reason you are applying for this loan. If your purpose is not listed, choose "Other" and provide details.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for this loan. If your purpose is not listed, select 'Other' and provide details.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for your loan. Common options include startup costs, inventory purchase, or other business needs.

fields.label: Other Loan Purpose
fields.placeholder: Please specify the purpose of your loan
fields.help_text: If your loan purpose doesn't fit the predefined categories, please describe it here.

fields.label: Preferred Loan Term
fields.help_text: Select your preferred loan term duration. Choose the timeframe that best fits your repayment capabilities and business needs.

fields.label: Preferred Loan Term
fields.help_text: Select your preferred loan repayment period. Choose between long-term (5-10 years), medium-term (1-5 years), or a revolving line of credit option.

fields.label: Preferred Loan Term
fields.help_text: Select your preferred loan repayment period. Choose from short-term, long-term, or revolving credit options.

fields.label: Interest Rate Preference
fields.help_text: Select your preferred interest rate type for the loan. Choose Fixed Rate for consistent payments, Variable Rate for potentially lower initial rates, or No Preference to see all options.

fields.label: Interest Rate Preference
fields.help_text: Select your preferred interest rate type for this loan. Choose fixed for consistent payments or variable for potentially lower initial rates. Select 'No Preference' if you'd like to discuss options with a loan officer.

fields.label: No Preference
fields.help_text: Select if you have no preference between fixed and variable interest rates

fields.label: Interest Rate Preference
fields.help_text: Select your preferred interest rate type for the loan. Fixed rates remain constant throughout the loan term, while variable rates may fluctuate with market conditions.

fields.label: Date Funds Needed By
fields.help_text: Select the date by which you need the loan funds to be disbursed

fields.label: Checking Accounts
fields.help_text: Enter the total value of all checking accounts in dollars

fields.label: Savings / Money Market
fields.help_text: Enter the total current value of your savings and money market accounts in dollars. Enter 0 if none.

fields.label: Investment Assets
fields.help_text: Include the total dollar value of retirement accounts (401k, IRA), stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and other investment holdings.

fields.label: Retirement Accounts (401k, IRA)
fields.help_text: Enter the total current value of all retirement accounts including 401(k), IRA, Roth IRA, and similar accounts. Enter 0 if none.

fields.label: Real Estate (Market Value)
fields.help_text: Enter the current market value of any real estate you own (homes, land, investment properties, etc.)

fields.label: Vehicles (Market Value)
fields.placeholder: Enter total market value of all vehicles
fields.help_text: Enter the current market value of all vehicles you own, including cars, motorcycles, boats, RVs, etc. Use fair market value, not purchase price.

fields.label: Other Assets
fields.help_text: Enter the total value of any additional assets not listed above (e.g., investments, savings accounts, jewelry, collectibles, etc.)

fields.label: Total Assets
fields.help_text: Enter the total value of all your assets in dollars. This should include the sum of vehicles, real estate, investments, and other assets.

fields.label: Mortgage Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the total outstanding balance on your mortgage(s). Include primary residence and any investment property mortgages.

fields.label: Auto Loans
fields.help_text: Enter the total outstanding balance of all auto loans (car, truck, motorcycle, etc.)

fields.label: Credit Card Balances
fields.help_text: Enter the total outstanding balance on all credit cards

fields.label: Student Loans
fields.help_text: Enter the total outstanding balance of all student loans. Enter 0 if you have no student loans.

fields.label: Other Liabilities
fields.help_text: Enter any additional liabilities not listed above (e.g., personal loans, medical debt, tax obligations)

fields.label: Total Liabilities
fields.help_text: Enter the total sum of all your liabilities including credit card balances, student loans, and other debts

fields.label: Net Worth
fields.help_text: Your net worth is calculated as Total Assets minus Total Liabilities. Enter the amount in dollars.

fields.label: Gross Revenue
fields.help_text: Enter the total gross revenue for your most recent fiscal year in dollars. Do not include dollar signs or commas.

fields.label: Fiscal Year End
fields.help_text: Enter the month and year your business fiscal year ends (e.g., 12/2023 for December 2023)

fields.label: Cost of Goods Sold
fields.help_text: Enter the total cost of goods sold (COGS) for the most recent fiscal year. This includes direct costs attributable to the production of goods sold by your business.

fields.label: Gross Profit
fields.help_text: Enter the gross profit in dollars from your most recent income statement. Gross profit is calculated as revenue minus cost of goods sold.

fields.label: Total Operating Expenses
fields.help_text: Enter the total operating expenses for your most recent fiscal year. This includes all costs of running the business excluding cost of goods sold (e.g., rent, utilities, salaries, marketing, insurance).

fields.label: Business Net Income
fields.help_text: Enter your business's net income in dollars from your most recent income statement. If the business has been operating for more than one year, provide the most recent fiscal year's net income.

fields.label: Prior Year Gross Revenue
fields.help_text: Enter the total gross revenue your business generated in the prior year (before expenses). This is used for year-over-year comparison.

fields.label: Prior Year Net Income
fields.help_text: Enter the net income from the previous fiscal year in dollars

fields.label: Primary Business Bank
fields.placeholder: Enter your bank name (e.g., First National Bank)
fields.help_text: Enter the name of the financial institution where your business maintains its primary banking relationship.

fields.label: Business Bank Account Number
fields.placeholder: Enter your business bank account number
fields.help_text: Provide the account number for your primary business banking account at First National Bank (if you are an existing customer)

fields.label: Average Monthly Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the average monthly balance for your business bank account in dollars (do not include cents or currency symbols)

fields.label: Existing First National Bank Customer
fields.help_text: Check this box if you already have an account with First National Bank. If yes, please provide your account number in the field below.

fields.label: Existing Account Number
fields.help_text: If you are an existing First National Bank customer, please provide your account number

fields.label: Creditor 1 - Name
fields.help_text: Provide the name of the financial institution, lender, or creditor for your first outstanding business debt (e.g., bank name, credit card company, vendor)

fields.label: Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the current outstanding balance for this debt in dollars

fields.label: Monthly Payment
fields.help_text: Enter the monthly payment amount in dollars for this debt

fields.label: Interest Rate (%)
fields.help_text: Enter the annual interest rate percentage for this debt

fields.label: Creditor 2 Name
fields.help_text: Enter the name of the second creditor for outstanding business debts, loans, or lines of credit.

fields.label: Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the current outstanding balance of this debt obligation in dollars

fields.label: Monthly Payment (Debt 2)
fields.help_text: Enter the monthly payment amount in dollars for your second debt or liability.

fields.label: Interest Rate (%)
fields.help_text: Enter the annual interest rate percentage for this debt

fields.label: Creditor 3 Name
fields.help_text: Enter the name of the third creditor, lender, or financial institution for outstanding business debt

fields.label: Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the current outstanding balance for this debt in dollars

fields.label: Monthly Payment
fields.help_text: Enter the monthly payment amount in dollars for this debt

fields.label: Interest Rate
fields.help_text: Enter the annual interest rate as a percentage (e.g., 5.25 for 5.25%)

fields.label: Primary Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the primary type of collateral being used to secure the loan. Choose the option that best represents the main asset backing this financing.

fields.label: Primary Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the primary type of collateral being used to secure the loan. Common options include inventory, accounts receivable, equipment/machinery, or residential real estate.

fields.label: Primary Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the primary type of collateral being offered to secure the loan. Common options include inventory, equipment/machinery, accounts receivable, or vehicles/fleet.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type(s) of collateral you are offering to secure the loan. Multiple selections may be allowed.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type(s) of collateral you are offering to secure the loan. Multiple selections may be allowed.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of collateral you will provide to secure this loan. Choose "None / Unsecured Request" if you are not providing collateral.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of collateral you are offering to secure the loan. Choose "None / Unsecured Request" if no collateral is being provided.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of collateral you are offering to secure this loan. Choose 'None / Unsecured Request' if you are not providing collateral.

fields.label: Collateral Description
fields.placeholder: Describe the collateral (e.g., real estate, equipment, inventory, vehicles)
fields.help_text: Provide a detailed description of the assets being used as collateral for this loan or financing arrangement.

fields.label: Estimated Value
fields.help_text: Enter the estimated current market value of the collateral in US dollars. This helps assess the security for the loan request.

fields.label: Existing Liens on Collateral
fields.help_text: Enter the total dollar amount of any existing liens or encumbrances currently on the collateral being offered for this loan.

fields.label: Collateral Location
fields.placeholder: Enter the address where collateral is located
fields.help_text: Provide the physical address where the collateral (assets securing this loan) is located. This may be different from your business address.

fields.label: Collateral Description (Second Item)
fields.placeholder: e.g., Equipment, real estate, vehicles, inventory
fields.help_text: Describe the second collateral item being offered to secure the loan, including type and identifying details.

fields.label: Estimated Value
fields.help_text: Enter the estimated dollar value of the additional collateral being offered (if any).

fields.label: Existing Liens (Collateral 2)
fields.help_text: Enter the total dollar amount of existing liens on the second collateral item. This represents any outstanding debts or claims already secured by this asset.

fields.label: Primary Applicant Personal Guarantee
fields.help_text: Check this box if the primary applicant agrees to provide a personal guarantee for this application

fields.label: Co-applicant Personal Guarantee
fields.help_text: Check this box if the co-applicant agrees to provide a personal guarantee for this application

fields.label: Other Guarantor
fields.help_text: Select if a guarantor other than the primary applicant or co-applicant will provide a personal guarantee. A separate guarantee form must be attached.

fields.label: Have you declared bankruptcy?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you have ever filed for bankruptcy. This information may be required for credit or financial assessments.

fields.label: Have you declared bankruptcy?
fields.help_text: Select 'No' if you have not declared bankruptcy in the past

fields.label: Are you currently subject to foreclosure proceedings?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you are currently subject to any foreclosure proceedings on any property.

fields.label: No Foreclosure
fields.help_text: Select if you are NOT involved in a foreclosure proceeding

fields.label: Are you currently involved in any lawsuit?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you are currently a party to any pending lawsuit or legal action

fields.label: Have you been involved in any lawsuits?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you have been involved in any lawsuits. Select 'No' if you have not been involved in any legal proceedings.

fields.label: Do you have any tax liens?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you currently have any outstanding tax liens filed against you or your property.

fields.label: Are there any outstanding judgments against you?
fields.help_text: Indicate if you currently have any unsatisfied judgments or court-ordered debts. Select "No" if you do not have any outstanding judgments.

fields.label: Are you currently delinquent on any federal debt?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you have any overdue federal debt obligations, such as tax debts, student loans, or other government debts.

fields.label: Are you currently delinquent on any Federal debt?
fields.help_text: Select 'No' if you are not currently delinquent on any Federal debt obligations (such as student loans, tax debt, or other government debts).

fields.label: Have you ever been convicted of a felony?
fields.help_text: Select 'Yes' if you have ever been convicted of a felony offense. This may affect your application.

fields.label: Have you ever been convicted of a felony?
fields.help_text: Select 'No' if you have never been convicted of a felony offense. A felony conviction may affect your eligibility.

fields.label: Do you have any legal obligations?
fields.help_text: Select 'Yes' if you have any legal obligations or declarations to report.

fields.label: I am not subject to backup withholding
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are not subject to backup withholding because: (a) you are exempt from backup withholding, or (b) you have not been notified by the IRS that you are subject to backup withholding as a result of a failure to report all interest or dividends, or (c) the IRS has notified you that you are no longer subject to backup withholding.

fields.label: Other Pending or Filed Applications
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you have any other applications pending or filed with immigration authorities

fields.label: No, I have not filed other applications for this invention
fields.help_text: Select this option if you have not filed any other patent or invention applications related to this invention (domestic or foreign)

fields.label: Are you employed by or have you ever been employed by the U.S. Government?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you are currently employed by or have ever been employed by any U.S. Government agency or department.

fields.label: Are you a government employee?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you are currently employed by a government entity

fields.label: Are you a related party?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you are a related party to the transaction or entity. Related parties typically include family members, business associates, or entities with common ownership or control.

fields.label: Related Party: No
fields.help_text: Select this option if there is no related party involved in this declaration

fields.label: Explanation of Relationship
fields.placeholder: Please describe your relationship with the bank employee or director
fields.help_text: If you answered 'Yes' to having a relationship with a First National Bank employee or director, please provide details about the nature of this relationship.

fields.label: Personal tax returns  prior year
fields.help_text: Check if you are submitting personal tax returns from the prior year

fields.label: Personal tax returns  prior year
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are providing your personal tax returns from the prior year

fields.label: Business Tax Returns  Prior Year
fields.help_text: Check if you are providing business tax returns from the prior year

fields.label: Business tax returns  prior year
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are providing your business tax returns from the prior year

fields.label: Business bank statements  last 6 months
fields.help_text: Please provide your business bank statements covering the most recent 6-month period.

fields.label: Business bank statements  last 6 months
fields.help_text: Please provide your business bank statements from the last 6 months. This helps verify your business's financial history and cash flow.

fields.label: Personal Bank Statements (Last 3 Months)
fields.help_text: Check this box to confirm you will provide your personal bank statements for the last 3 months. This may be required to verify financial stability and cash flow.

fields.label: Business Plan
fields.help_text: Required for startup businesses. Please attach a comprehensive business plan document.

fields.label: Articles of Incorporation / Organization
fields.help_text: Check this box to confirm you will provide your Articles of Incorporation (for corporations) or Articles of Organization (for LLCs)

fields.label: Business Licenses and Permits
fields.help_text: Check this box to confirm you have attached copies of all relevant business licenses and permits required to operate your business.

fields.label: Commercial Lease Agreement
fields.help_text: Check this box if you have a commercial lease agreement to submit. This document is only required if your business operates from a leased commercial property.

fields.label: Copy of Government-Issued Photo ID
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are including a copy of a government-issued photo ID (e.g., driver's license, passport) with your application.

fields.label: Proof of Business Insurance
fields.help_text: Check this box to indicate that proof of business insurance documentation is included with this application

fields.label: Accounts Receivable/Payable Aging Report
fields.help_text: Check if you are providing an accounts receivable or accounts payable aging report as part of your additional documentation

fields.label: Collateral Documentation
fields.help_text: Check if you are providing collateral documentation such as titles, deeds, or appraisals to support your application

fields.label: Additional Information
fields.placeholder: Describe any business achievements, contracts, growth projections, or circumstances relevant to your application...
fields.help_text: Use this space to provide any additional information that may help us evaluate your application, including business achievements, contracts in hand, growth projections, or any circumstances you would like to explain.

fields.label: How did you hear about us?
fields.help_text: Please select how you learned about our lending program. If you were referred by someone, you'll be asked to provide their name in the next field.

fields.label: Referral Name
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the person who referred you
fields.help_text: Please provide the full name of the person or organization that referred you to our lending program

fields.label: I agree to the terms and conditions
fields.help_text: You must agree to the terms and conditions to proceed with your application

fields.label: I/We authorize credit report inquiries
fields.help_text: By checking this box, you authorize the lender to perform credit report inquiries as part of the application process.

fields.label: I agree to use electronic signature
fields.help_text: Check this box to consent to signing this document electronically instead of with a handwritten signature

fields.label: Primary Applicant Printed Name
fields.help_text: Please print your full legal name as it appears on your identification. This should match the signature provided.

fields.label: Primary Applicant Signature
fields.help_text: Please sign to authorize credit report inquiries and confirm you have read and agree to the terms and conditions

fields.label: Date Signed
fields.help_text: Enter the date when you signed this document

fields.label: Co-Applicant / Guarantor Printed Name
fields.help_text: Print your full legal name as the co-applicant or guarantor. This should match your signature above.

fields.label: Co-Applicant / Guarantor Signature
fields.help_text: Signature of the co-applicant or guarantor, if applicable. This field should only be completed if there is a co-applicant or guarantor on the loan application.

fields.label: Co-Signer Date Signed
fields.help_text: Enter the date when the co-signer signed this document

fields.label: Loan Officer Name
fields.help_text: For bank use only. The name of the loan officer processing this application.

fields.label: Officer ID
fields.help_text: This field is for internal use only. Loan officers should enter their unique identification number.

fields.label: Bank Branch
fields.help_text: Enter the name or branch code of your bank branch (e.g., "Main Street Branch" or "001234")

fields.label: Date Received
fields.help_text: Enter the date when the bank received the application

fields.label: Application Number
fields.help_text: Enter the unique application number assigned to this bank application

fields.label: Bank Application Status
fields.help_text: Select the current status of the bank application. This will be used to track the application through the review process.

fields.label: Bank Notes Date
fields.help_text: Enter the date for any bank-related notes or observations
